title: Debugger invert watches and bps to insert at top
body:
This feature would change the watches and breakpoints window to add new items at the time of the window rather than the bottom.

Proposed Design
- 'Add watch' is at the top of the list
- Watches are after the 'add watch' input box
- Locals and exception objects at the bottom of the watches window
- Breakpoints are added at the top
- The persisted (to disk) order is also inverted so that the order is persisted across sessions
